workflow.name: Generate business ideas from Reddit posts with DeepSeek AI and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
Are you looking for the next big startup idea? This powerful n8n workflow helps you mine Reddit posts for real-world pain points, AI-solvable problems, and high-potential business opportunities ‚Äî without lifting a finger.



üß† What It Does

This workflow taps into the power of Reddit + AI to:

‚úÖ Scrape top posts from a subreddit of your choice (e.g., r/startups, r/Entrepreneur, r/SaaS).
‚úÖ Filter posts with real engagement and actual user frustrations.
‚úÖ Use AI to evaluate whether it's a real business-worthy problem.
‚úÖ Automatically generate practical business ideas, insights, and implementation plans using LLMs.
‚úÖ Save results to a connected Google Sheet with links, upvotes, and summaries.



üõ†Ô∏è Built With





n8n (no-code automation)



Reddit API



LangChain & OpenRouter LLMs (DeepSeek integration)



Google Sheets API



Custom code nodes with intelligent error handling



üßæ Use Cases





üß† Entrepreneurs hunting for idea validation or new pain points



üìä VCs & Analysts scanning real user needs



ü§ñ AI founders identifying automation opportunities



üéØ Makers building AI-first or SaaS tools



üí° Why It‚Äôs Special

Most idea generators are generic.
This one analyzes actual conversations, real pain, and filters based on AI-evaluable criteria ‚Äî giving you battle-tested insights that people care about.



üì¶ What's Included





‚úÖ Ready-to-run n8n JSON workflow (self-hosted or desktop)



‚úÖ Setup instructions (Google Sheet + Reddit + LLM config)



‚úÖ Example input/output sheet (Google Sheets)



‚úÖ Tips on prompt customization to match your target niche



‚öôÔ∏è Requirements





n8n (self-hosted or desktop)



Reddit account & API credentials



Google account (for Sheets)



OpenRouter API Key (for LLM access)



üéÅ Bonus

‚Üí Includes optimized AI prompts tailored to generate actionable business models ‚Äî not just fluff.



üì• Get Started Now

Unlock hundreds of undiscovered business opportunities from Reddit ‚Äî auto-processed, filtered, and AI-analyzed.





üß† Built by a creator obsessed with turning real problems into real products.
üõ†Ô∏è Verified on the n8n Creators Hub.
üåé Used by solopreneurs, makers, and AI founders worldwide.
**Feel free to reach out or DM the me if you need help customizing: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gerald-akhidenor-1ab1a45/

Reddit Business Idea Generator ‚Äî Full Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZCKtTS6GjaLQG0zKwY4qAvlXWIrjtlL3/view?usp=sharing**

user.name: Gerald Denor
user.bio:
Gerald Akhidenor is an AI Automation Lead Creative with 5 years of experience in AI automation consultancy. He specializes in n8n and API integrations, driving innovative automation solutions. As founder of DominixAI, Gerald combines creative vision and technical expertise to streamline processes and boost efficiency through cutting-edge AI technologies.
Website: https://dominixai.com
JobMonkey: https://trafficabc.com/jobmonkey-application-generator/

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
